BR_text.BRsummary: Development environment can't be installed on Windows
BR_text.BRdescription:
🐛Bug
 Reported by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sarthakpati>@sarthakpati</denchmark-link>
  in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fepegar/torchio/issues/347>#347</denchmark-link>
 .
 To reproduce
 git@github.com:fepegar/torchio.git
 pip install --editable ./torchio
 (C:\Projects\torchio\venv) PS C:\Projects\torchio> pip install --editable .
 Obtaining file:///C:/Projects/torchio
     ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1:
      command: 'C:\Projects\torchio\venv\python.exe' -c 'import sys, setuptools, tokenize; sys.argv[0] = '"'"'C:\\Projects\\torchio\\setup.py'"'"'; __file__='"'"'C:\\Projects\\torchio\\setup.py'"'"';f=getattr(tokenize, '"'"'open'"'"', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('"'"'\r\n'"'"', '"'"'\n'"'"');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, '"'"'exec'"'"'))' egg_info --egg-base 'C:\Users\sarth\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-pip-egg-info-o9yqppbr'
          cwd: C:\Projects\torchio\
     Complete output (7 lines):
     Traceback (most recent call last):
       File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
       File "C:\Projects\torchio\setup.py", line 8, in <module>
         readme = readme_file.read()
       File "C:\Projects\torchio\venv\lib\encodings\cp1252.py", line 23, in decode
         return codecs.charmap_decode(input,self.errors,decoding_table)[0]
     UnicodeDecodeError: 'charmap' codec can't decode byte 0x90 in position 14173: character maps to <undefined>
     ----------------------------------------
 ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1: python setup.py egg_info Check the logs for full command output.

comments_0.comment_text: Was there something wrong I was doing?

comments_1.comment_text:
No! I think it was just an encoding issue: <denchmark-link:https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49640513/unicodedecodeerror-charmap-codec-cant-decode-byte-0x9d-in-position-x-charac>https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49640513/unicodedecodeerror-charmap-codec-cant-decode-byte-0x9d-in-position-x-charac</denchmark-link>
 
 It'd be great if you could try again, as I don't have access to a Windows computer ATM.

comments_2.comment_text:
No! I think it was just an encoding issue: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49640513/unicodedecodeerror-charmap-codec-cant-decode-byte-0x9d-in-position-x-charac
 
 But, where?

comments_3.comment_text: I think the README file wasn't being read correctly in , which  uses to install the library: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fepegar/torchio/commit/9f4f7b40075ad688cba164e7598c0396d2168f60>9f4f7b4</denchmark-link>
